Name: Pleasure Kingdom
About the game: Pleasure Kingdom gameplay is a mix of traditional CCG mechanics with thrilling visual novel. Pleasure Kingdom tells a story of a long-standing war between Kingdom of humans and the mystical creatures living on their grounds. Follow a king, an elf and a witch on their epic pleasure adventure! Your goal is to select cards that work together to efficiently dispatch your enemies and move through the story. Choose your cards wisely! *All characters in the game are over 18 years old.* Features: - single player CGG mechanics - visual novel with choices - 22 gameplay levels - 5 animated sex scenes
